Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer® UltraTouch™ Push Button Blood Collection Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer UltraTouch Push Button Blood Collection Set for venipuncture blood specimen collection with safety retraction feature
Indications for Use Summary: A sterile, multiple sample, single-use fixed winged blood collection set for venipuncture to obtain blood specimens from patients; can be used with syringe or for short-term infusions, with needle safety feature to aid prevention of accidental needlestick injury.
